Contact.description: Let's connect! Whether you're looking for information, need help, or want to become part of the Planuojam community – reach out to us in a way that's convenient for you.

Form.title: Contact our team
Form.description:
Questions about the Planuojam platform, want to collaborate, or need help?
Our team is ready to help and answer your questions.

Write to us – we'll respond as quickly as possible.
Form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you…
Form.failure: Failed to send message. Please try again.

Map.title: Interactive Map
Map.description: Explore venues and services on our interactive map
Map.helperText: Select a location on the map or use the filters

archiveSection.title: Archive Listing
archiveSection.description: Archiving will hide your listing from public view. You can unarchive it later.
archiveSection.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to archive this listing? It will no longer be visible to users but you can restore it later.

unarchiveSection.title: Unarchive Listing
unarchiveSection.description: Unarchiving will make your listing visible to users again.
unarchiveSection.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to unarchive this listing? It will be visible to users again.

deleteSection.title: Delete Listing
deleteSection.description: Deleting will permanently remove your listing. This action cannot be undone.
deleteSection.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this listing? This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost.

Details.previewBanner: This is a preview of your listing. Other users won't see it until the listing is published.

status.archivedDescription: The owner has temporarily removed this listing from public view.
status.unavailableDescription: This listing is currently not available for viewing.
